TEXT: The applicant is a NORP citizen born in DATE and resident in GPE , GPE , GPE .
The facts , as submitted by the applicant , may be summarised as follows :

The applicant was a solicitor who practised on his own account DATE undertaking principally property transactions and residential conveyancing matters . He was instructed by Mr. PERSON DATE to act upon the sale and purchase of various properties . The purchases were financed by mortgages and the applicant was also instructed by the lending institutions ( including ORG ) to ensure that all legal formalities were complied with .
On DATE , following a jury trial , the applicant was convicted of conspiracy to obtain property by deception contrary to s.CARDINAL(CARDINAL ) of LAW DATE . He was sentenced to DATE imprisonment .
